column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailmore sharing services express sympathy condolences photos ralph emerson penisten, 95, of chillicothe passed from this life on saturday, june 20, 2015 in westmoreland place. he was born december 1, 1919 in ross county, the son of alva and bessie (riehle) penisten. he was married to arthella shewalter who preceded him in death in 1995. he later married norma v. (minney) carver who survives. also surviving are daughters, vickie (bob) stewart, chillicothe and dixie (stillman) starr, washington c. h.; step-daughters, robin (barry) haubeil, chillicothe, pamala (bruce) ballard, vinton county, teresa sayers, vinton county and clara (bill) bennett, chillicothe; step-sons, harold (joy) carver and jerry (cindy) carver, all of chillicothe; 3 grandchildren; 9 step-grandchildren; several great grandchildren; 9 step-great grandchildren; several great-great grandchildren; a brother, bob penisten, chillicothe; a sister-in-law, mabel penisten, chillicothe and several nieces and nephews. he was preceded in death by his parents, a son, danny penisten, sisters, virgie riley and betty birkheimer, a brother, oscar penisten, a sister-in-law, della penisten and a step-son-in-law, monty sayers. mr. penisten was a retired farmer, a long-time school bus driver for unioto schools and worked for the ross county engineer. he was a member of the ross county cattlemens association. he was a member of tabernacle baptist church where funeral services will be held at 1:00 pm on wednesday, june 24, 2015 with pastors donald shoemaker and andrew shearer officiating. burial will follow in greenlawn cemetery, frankfort. the family will receive friends at the church from 11:00 am until the hour of service on wednesday. the fawcett oliver glass and palmer funeral home is honored to be serving the family. click to send flowers using our local area florist free delivery to our funeral home & save on wire fees view/sign the condolence book. you have items in your basket. click here to review and/or checkout order directly from our recommended local area florist via our website and save on wire service fees and delivery charges to our funeral home. browse selection. send chocolates. express your condolences by sending a beautiful selection of chocolates, handcrafted in the usa. browse selection. veteran flag cases. we are proud to offer the finest heirloom-quality products to the families of our nation's veterans. browse products. bereavement productsa collection of books and bereavement products carefully designed to assist with the grieving process. browse products click the button to generate a printable document containing all condolences submittedcondolence booklet. add condolence
